articles.title: MotoGP, Bagnaia complains to Ducati that he’s not here to be a tester, but to win - GPOne.com
articles.description: “Up until FP3 I was a test rider, I tried a billion things and it's just not conceivable. Bastianini was very good, but he just needs to put in the fuel and go "
